DOC.brief_title: Observational Study ICD Pacemaker Sensing Presence IMED-4 Operation
DOC.detailed_description: The implanted CRM device shock therapy rate sensor temporarily deactivate placed magnet mode time IMED-4 activate . The IMED-4 activate time exceed 15 minute . During time IMED-4 active , CRM device programmer print voltage sense implanted lead real-time . The printout examine presence far-field sensing artifact .
DOC.criteria: Subjects active implantable CRM device Subjects > 18 year age Subjects ambulatory require assistance ambulation Subjects inform nature study agree provision provide write informed consent approve IRB Subjects pregnant lactating pregnant within past three month Subjects tattoo back electrode patch placement region Subjects past allergic reaction adhesives Subjects poor general physical/mental health , opinion investigator , allow subject good study candidate ( i.e . disease process , mental capacity , substance abuse , shorten life expectance , etc . )
